contents.text: Welcome to Hack Reactor, where you can reinvent your career with in-person or online, full-time or part-time software engineering programs.
To learn about our software engineering programs, press 1.
To hear about our full-time immersive bootcamp, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist for our full-time immersive bootcamp.

navigationGoals: Connect with a specialist to get details on the full-time immersive software engineering bootcamp.
I’d like to speak with a specialist about your full-time immersive bootcamp and how it aligns with my transition from military service.
I need a deep dive into the full-time immersive program’s curriculum stack, including modules, instructional hours, and project-based learning details.
I need information about the daily schedule and support for the full-time immersive bootcamp.
I’d like to speak with someone about the full-time immersive bootcamp curriculum and schedule.

contents.text: To learn about our part-time flex programs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist for our part-time flex programs.

navigationGoals: Speak with someone about the part-time flex program’s schedule and format.
I need details on the part-time flex software engineering program schedule so I can balance it with my current commitments.
I’d like to understand the part-time flex schedule architecture, including live session frequency, asynchronous content, and remote collaboration tools.
I want to know if the part-time flex program’s pace and hours can fit my routine.
I want to learn more about the part-time flex program options and how they fit around my studies.

contents.text: For admissions and financing options, press 2.
To discuss tuition and financial aid, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our financial aid advisors.

navigationGoals: Ask a financial aid advisor about tuition costs and available funding options.
I need information on tuition costs and veteran financial aid options, including how to use my GI Bill benefits.
Could you walk me through the tuition breakdown, financing structures like ISAs, deferred tuition, and scholarship eligibility criteria?
I need to discuss tuition fees and financial aid or payment plan options.
I need details on tuition costs and available financial aid or scholarships.

contents.text: For application support and next steps, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our admissions team.

navigationGoals: Request guidance on application requirements and next steps for enrollment.
I’d like guidance on the application process, deadlines, and whether my military training can count for credit.
I’m looking for step-by-step guidance on the application pipeline: prerequisites, coding assessments, interview stages, and submission deadlines.
I need help completing my application and learning the required documents.
I’m looking for guidance on the application process and next steps to enroll.
